thread.title: Karan Johar unveils scintillating posters of Swara Bhaskar's 'Anaarkali of Aarah' | Zee News
thread.title_full: Karan Johar unveils scintillating posters of Swara Bhaskar's 'Anaarkali of Aarah' | Zee News

title: Karan Johar unveils scintillating posters of Swara Bhaskar's 'Anaarkali of Aarah' | Zee News
text:
Karan Johar unveils scintillating posters of Swara Bhaskar's 'Anaarkali of Aarah' By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 13:00 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood filmmaker Karan Johar took to Twitter on Monday to unveil two posters of Swara Bhaskar's upcoming film 'Anaarkali of Aarah'. Interestingly, in both the stills, you will get to witness a never-seen-before avatar of the 28-year-old actress. 
KJo also congratulated the 'Raanjhanaa' actress for the same. "Well done @ReallySwara for constantly breaking ground!! 24th march is the date guys ! For this new world and engaging film!!!" the 'Student Of The Year' director tweeted along with a poster. 
Have a look: 
— Karan Johar (@karanjohar) 20 February 2017 Well done @ReallySwara for constantly breaking ground!! 24th march is the date guys ! For this new world and engaging film!!! pic.twitter.com/3zmuUvOIrO 
— Karan Johar (@karanjohar) 20 February 2017 
The film is slated to release on March 24 this year. MUST READ 
It is being said that Swara will be seen playing a singer, who hails from Bihar's Arrah, in 'Anaarkali of Aarah'. The flick is being directed by Avinash Das. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 13:00 More from zeenews
